main event: On the evening of 8 July 1962, a police officer reported seeing a bright object in the sky over British Honduras that hovered for about 10 minutes before accelerating and disappearing.
interesting points: The object appeared to be oval in shape and was estimated to be 30 to 40 feet in diameter,Three smaller objects were also seen, approximately 6 to 8 feet in diameter,The officer noted that the object was 3 times larger than a star and pulsated at times,No sound was heard during the observation,The case remains unresolved as no definitive explanation was found.
sighted object: a bright oval object accompanied by smaller objects
witness description: the observer was a police officer
